The Goodzilla

The Beginning...

Hordes of invaders have been raiding the city of Tokyo since your ancestors have left town, but the local folks seem to have taken a liking for your adorable stature.


Your peaceful routine of napping by the local koi pond and munching on your treasure trove of snacks seems to be just a memory. Restore peace and order to the city before it's too late, good luck little goodzilla!

How to Play

  • SPACE BAR to shoot fireballs
  • UP ARROW to jump
  • DOWN ARROW to crouch

Pick a goodzilla.

Game Over
